TopicTitle: I heard that 0.21 is final update before career mode

Articles.Content: I heard that next update will have career mode?
What you heard was wild speculation from someone who doesn't speak for squad. They have made no such assertions.
Besides, career mode isn't implemented ''like that''. They're gonna do it in ''steps'' with Astronaut Complex being one of them.

I heard the next update will include porcine pilots, their little stubby snouts snuffling as they hurtle across the skies, curly little tails wibble, wobbling more than my rocket, re-entry heat making bacon.

Pigs will fly.

... re-entry heat making bacon.

This. We must have this!

Yeah, no.

To have career mode you'd need a lot of things that aren't in the game ATM.

Unless you hear or read things like this directly from Squad, you have heard or read wrong. Please note that this is nothing but speculation.

Please refrain from starting threads that are based on rumors; they only spread false information and generate more rumors.
